original_text:
Dog Town Deal
La nuova slot del provider Quickspin, Dog Town Deal è un mix tra una macchinetta tradizionale e il Blackjack, famoso gioco di carte diffuso in tutto il mondo.
Prima di spiegare le meccaniche di gioco, spendiamo due parole per la grafica, che, come al solito, è uno dei fiori all’occhiello di questa software house. Dog Town Deal è ambientata in una bisca clandestina e vede dei simpatici cani nella parte degli scommettitori. Le fiches hanno impressa l’impronta di una zampa, il Wild è stilizzato con un osso, sullo sfondo si intravedono cani vestiti in abiti eleganti davanti al tavolo da gioco. La grafica ha lo stile dei cartoon, i personaggi sembrano usciti da un film di animazione e in generale c’è una particolare attenzione per i dettagli che fa capire quanti sia stato importante il lavoro svolto dalla Quickspin.
La musica jazz che accompagna le giocate è un plus che serve a creare un’atmosfera rilassata e coinvolgente.
 
Caratteristiche di Dog Town Deal
La griglia classica ha 5 rulli e 3 righe e sul lato sinistro presenta una fila di moltiplicatori da 1x a 15x, più una fila di numeri progressivi dal 16 al 21 utili per vincere a Blackjack. Le paylines sono 20 e fisse, la scommessa parte da un minimo di 0,20 € e c’è la possibilità di ottenere una vincita massima pari a 1.116 volte la puntata.
Il tasto del fulmine ci consente di velocizzare la rotazione degli Spin, con il tasto Autoplay invece possono essere attivati i giri automatici, da un minimo di 10 a un massimo di 1.000.
La volatilità è bassa, il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP) è del 96,15%.
 
Come si vince a Dog Town Deal
Innanzitutto, per vincere è necessario creare combo di 3, 4 o 5 simboli identici adiacenti, a partire dal primo rullo di sinistra e procedendo verso destra.
I simboli meno remunerativi sono le quattro fiches colorate, che hanno tutte lo stesso valore. Pagano meglio i 4 cani: chihuahua, beagle e bulldog sono sulla stessa linea, mentre l’alano ricompensa il triplo degli altri.
Il Wild ha funzione di Jolly e sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto gli speciali, inoltre in combo di almeno 3 paga il doppio dell’alano.
Le carte da gioco sono invece lo Scatter. Se ne atterrano due durante lo stesso Spin, verranno girate e nel caso la somma raggiunga 16 o più, allora alla puntata verrà applicato il moltiplicatore indicato nella colonna sulla sinistra della griglia. Se invece le carte atterrate saranno 3 o più, allora vinceremo da 7 a 15 Free Spins del tutto particolari. Infatti, ogni volta che otteniamo una combo pagante, ci verranno consegnate delle carte con cui giocare a Blackjack. In questo modo si potranno scalare i gradini dei moltiplicatori e ottenere vincite molto alte!

Domande Frequenti 
Dove trovo Dog Town Deal?

Questo nuovo gioco a breve sarà presente su tutti i maggiori casinò italiani dotati di certificazione AAMS.



Qual è la volatilità di questo gioco?

La volatilità è bassa.



Qual è la vincita massima di Dog Town Deal?

Si può vincere una somma pari a 1.116 volte la puntata.

raw_translation.response:
Introducing Quickspin's latest slot game, Dog Town Deal - a combination of traditional slot machines and the world-renowned card game, Blackjack. First and foremost, let us take a moment to appreciate the outstanding graphics that have become synonymous with this software house. Set in a clandestine den, Dog Town Deal features a cast of lovable canines playing the role of gamblers, with each chip stamped with a paw print and Wild symbol depicted as a stylized bone. The background sees elegantly dressed dogs standing beside the game table. Tapping into the style of cartoon animation, each character is filled with personality, bringing the game to life. The attention to detail here is astounding; it's clear that Quickspin has left no stone unturned in crafting this masterpiece. An enchanting jazz soundtrack complements the gameplay, immersing players in the game's world.

Dog Town Deal features a classic 5x3 reel with a multiplier column ranging from 1x to 15x on the left-hand side, coupled with a row of progressive numbers from 16 to 21 to assist with Blackjack. There are 20 fixed paylines, and the minimum bet starts at 0.20€, with the potential to win up to 1,116 times your initial stake. Toggling the thunderbolt button allows players to speed up the spinning action, while the Autoplay feature can be activated to play from anywhere between 10 to 1,000 automatic spins. The game's volatility is set at low, and the theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.15%.

To give yourself the best chance of winning, keep an eye out for combo sets of 3, 4, or 5 matching symbols adjacent to each other starting from the first reel on the left and progressing towards the right. The least profitable symbols are the four colourful chips with roughly the same value. The 4 dogs (Chihuahua, Beagle, Bulldog, and Greyhound) are more rewarding in terms of payout potential, with the Greyhound rewarding 3x more than the other three breeds. The Wild symbol serves as a substitute for all other symbols bar the special ones, and any combinations featuring 3 or more Wild symbols are rewarded with double the score of the Greyhound. The Scatter symbols are simple playing cards. Landing two during a single spin will be flipped over; if the sum of the card total equals 16 or more, then a multiplier will be applied to the initial bet. If three or more Scatters land in a single spin, then up to 15 Free Spins will be awarded. During these spins, each winning combo delivers a card with which to play Blackjack, unlocking chances to hit higher payout multipliers.

This exciting new game will soon be available on all major Italian casinos that carry an AAMS certification.

-What is the volatility of this game?
The volatility is low.

-What is the maximum payout of Dog Town Deal?
The maximum payout is up to 1,116 times the initial stake.

Dog Town Deal
The new slot game by the provider Quickspin, Dog Town Deal, is a mix between a traditional slot machine and Blackjack, the world-renowned card game. But let's first talk about the graphics, which, as usual, are one of the strengths of this software house. Dog Town Deal is set in an underground casino and features cute dogs in the role of the bettors. The chips have paw prints on them, the Wild symbol is stylized as a bone, and in the background, dogs dressed in elegant clothes can be seen in front of the gaming table. The graphics have a cartoon style, the characters seem to have come out of an animation film, and in general, there is a particular attention to detail that shows the amount of work done by Quickspin.

The jazz music accompanying the game is a plus that helps create a relaxed and engaging atmosphere.

Features of Dog Town Deal
The classic grid has 5 reels and 3 rows and on the left side, it presents a row of multipliers from 1x to 15x, plus a row of progressive numbers from 16 to 21 useful for winning at Blackjack. There are 20 fixed paylines, and the bet starts from a minimum of €0.20, with the possibility of obtaining a maximum win equal to 1,116 times the bet.

The lightning button allows us to speed up the rotation of the Spins, while the Autoplay button can activate automatic spins, from a minimum of 10 to a maximum of 1,000. The volatility is low, and the theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.15%.

How to win at Dog Town Deal
First of all, to win, it is necessary to create combinations of 3, 4, or 5 adjacent identical symbols, starting from the first reel on the left and proceeding towards the right. The least lucrative symbols are the four colored chips, which all have the same value. The 4 dogs - chihuahua, beagle, and bulldog are on the same line, while the greyhound rewards three times more than the others.

The Wild symbol functions as a wild card and replaces all symbols except the special ones. In addition, in combos of at least 3, it pays twice the amount of the greyhound.

The playing cards are instead the Scatters. If two of them land during the same Spin, they will be turned over, and if the sum reaches 16 or more, the multiplier indicated in the left column of the grid will be applied to the bet. If, on the other hand, three or more cards land, we will win from 7 to 15 very special Free Spins. In fact, every time we get a winning combo, we will be given cards to play Blackjack. In this way, we can climb the ladder of multipliers and obtain very high winnings!

Review:
 
Game Description

Dog Town Deal is a Quickspin video slot game that combines elements of traditional slot machines with the popular card game, Blackjack. Set in a clandestine den, the game features a cast of lovable canines playing the role of gamblers, each chip stamped with a paw print. The game features 20 fixed paylines, and the minimum bet starts at 0.20€ with the potential to win up to 1,116 times your initial stake. The game's volatility is set at low, and the theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.15%.

Graphics and Sound

Dog Town Deal boasts outstanding graphics, with each character filled with personality, bringing the game to life. The attention to detail is astounding, and Quickspin has left no stone unturned in crafting this masterpiece. The game's enchanting jazz soundtrack complements the gameplay, immersing players in the game's world.

Game Mechanics and Features

Dog Town Deal features a classic 5x3 reel with a multiplier column ranging from 1x to 15x on the left-hand side, with a row of progressive numbers from 16 to 21 to assist with Blackjack. The game includes an Autoplay feature that can be activated to play from anywhere between 10 to 1,000 automatic spins. The game's volatility is set at low, and the theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.15%. During the Free Spins feature, each winning combo delivers a card with which to play Blackjack, unlocking chances to hit higher payout multipliers.

High and Low Paying Symbols

To give yourself the best chance of winning, look out for combo sets of 3, 4, or 5 matching symbols adjacent to each other starting from the first reel on the left and progressing towards the right. The colourful chips are the least profitable symbols, with roughly the same value. The game features four dogs (Chihuahua, Beagle, Bulldog, and Greyhound), which are more rewarding in terms of payout potential. The Greyhound rewards 3x more than the other three breeds. The Wild symbol serves as a substitute for all other symbols bar the special ones, and any combinations featuring 3 or more Wild symbols are rewarded with double the score of the Greyhound.

Scatters and Free Spins

The Scatter symbols are simple playing cards. Land two during a single spin, and they will be flipped over. If the sum of the card total equals 16 or more, then a multiplier will be applied to the initial bet. If three or more Scatters land in a single spin, then up to 15 Free Spins will be awarded.
